blogPost.excerpt: Send Letters Online! 💌 1. Write your letter ✍️, enter the receiver's address 📮 & pay $. 2. Letterflix's automated PrintCenter will print 🖨, package 📨, and ship 🚀. 3. Your loved ones will receive it within 7 days 🥳 🤩 or 10-15 days in another country 🌏.
blogPost.body: Send Letters Online! 💌 1. Write your letter ✍️, enter the receiver's address 📮 & pay $. 2. Letterflix's automated PrintCenter will print 🖨, package 📨, and ship 🚀. 3. Your loved ones will receive it within 7 days 🥳 🤩 or 10-15 days in another country 🌏.
blogPost.title: Letterflix - Send letters online 💌
blogPost.author: Rajat Dangi

localize.description: 在线发送信件! 💌 1. 写好你的信✍️，输入收信人的地址📮，并支付$。 2. Letterflix的自动打印中心将打印🖨，包装📨，并运送🚀。3. 您的亲人将在7天内收到🥳 🤩，或在其他国家10-15天内收到🌏。
在線發送信件! 💌 1. 寫好你的信✍️，輸入收信人的地址📮，並支付$。 2. Letterflix的自動打印中心將打印🖨，包裝📨，並運送🚀。3. 您的親人將在7天內收到🥳 🤩，或在其他國家10-15天內收到🌏。

previous.excerpt: Buy less, by knowing more. Discover great quality clothes that don’t sacrifice the environment or the people that made them. Putting sustainable brands front and centre. ✅ Find clothes made by brands that care ✅ Read honest reviews from people, not brands ✅ Make more informed purchases
previous.title: Good Garms - Curated sustainable clothing

localize.description: 通过了解更多信息，减少购买量。发现那些不以牺牲环境或制造它们的人为代价的优质服装。把可持续发展的品牌放在首位。✅ 寻找由关心环境的品牌所制造的衣服 ✅ 阅读来自人们而非品牌的诚实评论 ✅ 进行更明智的购买。
通過了解更多信息，減少購買量。發現那些不以犧牲環境或製造它們的人爲代價的優質服裝。把可持續發展的品牌放在首位。✅ 尋找由關心環境的品牌所製造的衣服 ✅ 閱讀來自人們而非品牌的誠實評論 ✅ 進行更明智的購買。

next.excerpt: Steady Newsletters is for independent writers, who are looking for a home for their work and are not averse to making money from it. Send professionally designed newsletters, including videos, podcasts, and tweets. Free to use, we keep 10% commission.
next.title: Steady Newsletters - Newsletters with paid memberships for independent writers

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是为独立作家，谁正在寻找一个家为他们的工作，并不反感从它赚钱。发送专业设计的新闻通讯，包括视频、播客和推特。免费使用，我们保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 为独立作家提供付费会员资格的新闻通讯。

localize.description: Steady Newsletters是爲獨立作家，誰正在尋找一個家爲他們的工作，並不反感從它賺錢。發送專業設計的新聞通訊，包括視頻、播客和推特。免費使用，我們保留10%的佣金。
localize.tagline: 爲獨立作家提供付費會員資格的新聞通訊。
